title: Persist positioning_version_id on customer-facing artifacts and outcome events

sections.text: When a positioning recommendation is applied (e.g., exported to sales enablement, pushed to a segment brief, or used in an email/landing-page template), persist the active positioning_version_id alongside the generated artifact and any subsequent tracked outcome events (conversion, win/loss, churn). This creates a durable join key between downstream outcomes and the exact positioning version from the existing change log. Ensure backfill behavior is safe (leave null for historical records) and add minimal schema/index updates needed for querying.
